title: The Case of the Frightened Lady (1940 film) The Scarf Murder Mystery | Marius Goring, Helen Haye

sources.title: The Case of the Frightened Lady (1940 film) The Scarf Murder Mystery | Marius Goring, Helen Haye
sources.description:
Based on an Edgar Wallace whodunit about an aristocratic family stalked by an unseen killer...

Original title: The Case of the Frightened Lady (1940) AKA: The Frightened Lady (1940)

This movie is available with subtitles in many languages.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/eM8dAacMNo0


Director: George King
Producer: S. W. Smith
Writer: Edgar Wallace, Edward Dryhurst, Robert Stevenson
Stars: Marius Goring, Felix Aylmer, Ronald Shiner, Helen Haye
Genre: Classics, Colorized, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Literary


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:28 Mysterious events unfold at Marks Priory as tensions rise and secrets are revealed.
08:35 Murder mystery unfolds at Marks Priory as Studd is found strangled with an Indian scarf.
16:17 Murder mystery unfolds as Chief Inspector Tanner investigates a suspicious death at a manor house.
21:41 Investigation into a murder at Marks Priory involving suspects with conflicting alibis.
29:32 Mysterious events unfold at Marks Priory as Dr. Amersham faces suspicion and secrets are revealed.
37:44 A nobleman recounts suspicious events involving a doctor, a murder, and family secrets at Marks Priory.
43:27 Mysterious events unfold at Marks Priory involving a murder, suspects, and hidden secrets.
49:49 Murder mystery unfolds as detective questions Lady Lebanon about Dr. Amersham's death and hidden room.
55:10 Murder mystery unravels secrets of a noble family, involving blackmail, hidden rooms, and suspicious characters.
1:02:09 Mysterious events unfold at Marks Priory involving a murder plot and family secrets.
1:11:48 A chilling confession of murder and manipulation unfolds in a conversation between two characters.
